alert.note: Alert for Beckham; Custer; Dewey; Major; Washita; Woodward (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 13 at 1:11AM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Washita, Custer, Dewey, western Major, east central Beckham and southeastern Woodward Counties through 145 AM CST... At 110 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles northwest of Cestos to 10 miles northwest of Putnam to 3 miles south of Foss Reservoir to near Retrop. Movement was northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clinton, Cordell, Taloga, Burns Flat, Seiling, Arapaho, Vici, Dill City, Canute, Custer City, Butler, Bessie, Camargo, Foss, Mutual, Putnam, Retrop, Foss Reservoir, Orion and Chester. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 42 and 70. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Beckham; Custer; Dewey; Major; Washita; Woodward
